column5: Is there any fishing opportunities in the Auburn area?   I think were camping next weekend........ Thanks Jeff.

It's settled.   We are going camping next weekend on the Maitland River apparently right in Auburn.  Thanks for the info Splashhopper.  I'm not organizing this one as its a family weekend.  What should I prepare for, strictly Bass?????  I'm have never fished the river before and curious what species I will run into?  Thanks. Jeff
